DOC.brief_title: Eccentric Training With Without Elbow Brace Epicondylitis
DOC.detailed_description: Two study arm plan group perform home-based eccentric training use Thera-Band Flex-Bar device . Supination pronation perform position hold 2 15 repetition . This repeat three set 15 repetition twice daily . In word , 6x15 repetition supination pronation per day suggest eccentric training use Thera-Band Flex-Bar . The combination group perform eccentric training . In addition , patient wear orthopedic elbow brace ( Epi-Hit ) order overcome elbow pain . This clinical trial , thus pain reduction visual analogue scale primary outcome parameter . Evaluation perform 12 week intervention .
